name: Reflections (itch) (SpaceBabyGames)
description: Reflections is a conceptual base puzzle game for anxiety; both the anxiety of losing yourself and someone in the crowd, with the anxious feeling of being lost. The two-perception mechanic was a visual representation of engaging with triggers in order to make progress within the safe yet static world melding in two worlds and the game only excels once the player realises to work simultaneously in both worlds to tackle hurdles. This is done purposefully to portray the message of how it's all about finding your balance.  Only by joining every part of us the good, bad and ugly can we move forward and achieve exceptionally.
